thread.title: Ankit Tiwari set to perform series of music shows across India -
thread.title_full: Ankit Tiwari set to perform series of music shows across India - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ankit Tiwari set to perform series of music shows across India -
text:
Singer-music composer Ankit Tiwari is preparing for a series of music shows titled 'Love Anthem Tour' across various cities in India later this year.
READ: â€‹ Ankit Tiwari: No plans of becoming an actor
The 'Tu Hai Ki Nahi' singer will be performing with his band, "The Band" during the tour. His brother Ankur is also actively involved with the venture through their company Brotherhood Entertainment Pvt Ltd.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
Ankit has already begun jamming with his band and the bits of these sessions have also been uploaded on their Youtube channel Brotherhood Entertainment. One such jamming session of his popular song 'Tu Jo Hai' is also uploaded, which is definitely going to impress the audiences.
Ankit plans to kick off the tour from his hometown Kanpur, where they are considering not charging the fans even a penny to enjoy the show.
For more interesting Music news and pictures follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
For latest Music updates follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
"I hail from Kanpur and shifting base to Mumbai was only with the backing of these melodious songs. So my brother Ankur was initially planning a show in Kanpur free for the fans. But then we thought of staging a tour all over India to give back all the love and support our fans have showered and blessed us with over a period of time," he said.
Listen to Ankit Tiwari on Gaana.com
Ankit has already bagged two Film fare Awards for his music and singing for films Aashiqui 2 and Ek Villain respectively.
WATCH: Ankit Tiwari, accused of rape tells court the act was consensual - TOI
